Key Arguments: The legislation is viewed as an attack on free speech.
Concerns that the government and its approved outlets will become the sole source of truth.
Offense at the use of taxpayer dollars to potentially silence opinions and restrict access to diverse information.
Notable Quotes: I am horrified at this attack on free speech and the attempt to make the government and its approved outlets the single source of truth.
This is not acceptable and to think my tax dollars will be used to silence my opinions or the ability to find wide ranging information on topics is truly offensive.
